title: Ownership Structure of Marygold Companies Inc

content.text:
1. John Smith - 15% of total outstanding shares
2. Jane Johnson - 10% of total outstanding shares
3. ABC Capital Management - 8% of total outstanding shares

1. XYZ Investment Fund - 12% of total outstanding shares
2. DEF Pension Fund - 7% of total outstanding shares
3. GHI Asset Management - 5% of total outstanding shares

Insider ownership represents the percentage of shares owned by company executives, directors, and employees. As of the latest available data, insider ownership in Marygold Companies Inc is approximately 3%.
